title: what do i do now thanks to 6.22 ?
body: i have no ide what happend tbh lets start easy i like the champion changes not to bad but what i dident like was the item changes how in the fuck are we going to get cdr now? you just runied most of the supports riot you know that? quick mentions {{champion:40}} {{champion:25}} {{champion:78}} {{champion:143}} all champions whitch i really enjoy (not poppy) i have no clue now i guess we will see whats "meta" this time cuz orignality dont exsist in this game.

replies.body: CDR is overrated, there is nothing like a good old BF sword. It doesn't even need to be sharp, you can just use its weight to smash your opponent's ugly face.
